headline: PTC Showcases Intelligent Product Lifecycle Vision with Lamborghini at CES 2026
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it will demonstrate how Automobili Lamborghini S.p.A can leverage the Intelligent Product Lifecycle to improve the development process by creating a centralized product data foundation that connects design, engineering, and operations, and enables AI-driven transformation.

raw.headline: PTC Showcases Intelligent Product Lifecycle Vision with Lamborghini at CES 2026

headline: PTC Therapeutics to Present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: PTC Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ: PTCT) today announced that CEO Matthew B. Klein, M.D., will present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, Jan. 12, 2026, at 9 a.m. PST/12 p.m. EST.
